casebody.data:
Robert J. WITTMAN, et al., appellants,
v.
Gloria PERSONHUBALLAH, et al. No. 14-1504. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 29, 2016.

Motion of the State appellees for divided argument and enlargement of time for oral argument granted and the time is divided as follows: 35 minutes for appellants, 10 minutes for State appellees, 15 minutes for private appellees, and 10 minutes for the Solicitor General. Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
